summary: Implements a compatibility layer that translates OpenAI‑style embedding requests and responses to Azure AI Cohere’s embed API format, and provides a client wrapper to call Azure AI services for generating text and image embeddings, handling both synchronous and asynchronous HTTP interactions and normalizing results into a unified response structure.
business_intent: Enable developers to obtain vector embeddings from Azure AI services using a familiar OpenAI‑compatible interface, supporting diverse input types and simplifying integration across applications.
